org.asoem.greyfish.utils.base

Class SingleElementCache<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.asoem.greyfish.utils.base.Memoizer<T>
      • org.asoem.greyfish.utils.base.SingleElementCache<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of the element to supply
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.google.common.base.Supplier<T>

    @ThreadSafe
public final class SingleElementCache<T>
extends Memoizer<T>
    A single element cache is a memoizer of an object of type T.

    The cache can be invalidated so that it will reload the memoized value on the next call to Memoizer.get()

    • Method Summary

      Check if given memoized value is valid.
      protected void loaded(T t)
      This method will be called if the memoizer has loaded and stored the value t to memoize.
      static <T> SingleElementCache<T> memoize(com.google.common.base.Supplier<T> delegate)
      Create a new SingleElementCache which computes it's memoized value using delegate.

      • isValid

        protected boolean isValid(com.google.common.base.Optional<T> memoized)
        Description copied from class: Memoizer
        Check if given memoized value is valid.

        If this method returns false than the memoizer will update it's memoized value using Memoizer.delegate()

        Specified by:
        isValid in class Memoizer<T>
        Parameters:
        memoized - the current memoized value which is absent if the memoizer has not been initialized yet.
        Returns:
        true if the memoizer holds a valid value, false otherwise

      • loaded

        protected void loaded(T t)
        Description copied from class: Memoizer
        This method will be called if the memoizer has loaded and stored the value t to memoize.
        Overrides:
        loaded in class Memoizer<T>
        Parameters:
        t - the new memoized value
